2026-02-08T07:27:00.CONTENT_EN: Due to high wind , the following special traffic and transport arrangements have been implemented on Hong Kong-Zhuhai-Macao Bridge Hong Kong Link Road (HZMB HKLR), with details as shown below: The speed limit of the HZMB HKLR is lowered from 100 km/h to 50 km/h.
2026-02-08T07:27:00.CONTENT_CN: 由於強風，港珠澳大橋香港連接路已實施以下特別交通及運輸安排： 港珠澳大橋香港連接路的最高車速限制由每小時100 公里降低至每小時50 公里。

2026-02-08T11:10:00.CONTENT_EN: Due to improved weather condition, the following arrangements have been implemented on Hong Kong-Zhuhai-Macao Bridge Hong Kong Link Road (HZMB HKLR): The speed limit of the HZMB HKLR resumes to 100 km/h.
2026-02-08T11:10:00.CONTENT_CN: 因天氣情況改善，港珠澳大橋香港連接路已實施以下安排： 港珠澳大橋香港連接路最高車速限制恢復為每小時100 公里。

description.INCIDENT_DETAIL_EN: Handy tips for travelling during holidays

2026-02-10T06:15:00.CONTENT_EN:
As it is the peak period for travel, please note the following before taking High Speed Rail:

1. allow more time for immigration procedures. Passengers may enter the gate at Level B1 up to 120 minutes before departure of the train. 

2. visit the 12306 official website (12306. cn) or mobile app to check for the latest train schedules and any service adjustments. 

3. use public transport to get to the station as parking places will be in high demand. 

4. use the drop-off/pick-up area at the Ground level, Exit B (Wui Man Road pick-up/drop-off area) for pre-booked taxis or vehicles. 
.
2026-02-10T06:15:00.CONTENT_CN:
因應假日出行高峰，乘坐高速鐵路出發前請注意：

1.預留足夠時間辦理出入境手續。最早可於開車前120分鐘於B1層入閘。

2.瀏覽12306官方網站(12306.cn)或手機應用程式，查看最新列車班次及車務調動資訊。

3.車站停車場泊位需求緊張，建議使用公共交通工具前往。

4.建議於地面層B出口(匯民道上落客區)等候預約的士或車輛。
。
